Lde/ecspride/MainActivity;->onSaveInstan: The method retrieves the subscriber ID from the TelephonyManager service using getSubscriberId(), which potentially contains user personal data (phone number or IMEI). This data is then stored in an instance variable 's' of type java.lang.String within the same class, MainActivity.
Lde/ecspride/MainActivity;->onRestoreIns: This method sends a text message containing user-provided phone number and message content from the instance variable 's' in the MainActivity, without any sanitization or validation of the input before using it to send an SMS.
